summary: Ryan figures out a way to make his parents dissappear, but something goes wrong when his friend, Holly, starts disappearing too.
cast: Christopher Lloyd|Blake Foster|Michael Purvis|Anton Tennet|Todd Emerson|Olivia Tennet|Anna Wilson|Ezra Edmond|Charlotte Krem|Christina Krem|Kate Smith|Michelle Kittrell|Jerry Miscevich|Leah Schilling
title: Kids World
